msg:
# Convert mkv to mp4
avconv -i input.mkv -codec copy output.mp4

# Convert all files from current directory into mp3
for f in *; do avconv -i "$f" "$f.mp3"; done

# Convert avi to mp4
avconv -i input.avi -c:v libx264 -c:a copy output.mp4

# Extract audio track from file
avconv -i imput.mp4 -vn -acodec copy output_audio.aac
